scripts.pretest: rimraf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -g d3-array:d3,d3-axis:d3,d3-scale:d3,d3-selection:d3,d3-timer:d3,d3-transition:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-bullet.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-bullet.js -c -m -o build/d3-bullet.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-bullet/build/d3-bullet.js d3-bullet.v1.0.js && cp ../d3-bullet/build/d3-bullet.min.js d3-bullet.v1.0.min.js && git add d3-bullet.v1.0.js d3-bullet.v1.0.min.js && git commit -m "d3-bullet ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-bullet.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-bullet.js build/d3-bullet.min.js
